name: SHELL SHOOTERS
description:
Egg-cellent shooter! Get crackin' with the world's most advanced egg multi-shooter. Take control of an egg and wield a variety of weapons.

Your goal is to kill your egg opponents. You must crack other eggs open using your advanced weaponry while avoiding being cracked yourself. Everyone is your enemy!

Get crackin' with the world's most advanced egg-based shooter!
Equip sniper rifles, shotguns, pistols, eggs, grenades and more as you battle across arenas for yolk supremacy, or join up in squads to Capture the Spatula!
